title: Publish Version 58: update version markers and deployment verification docs

requirements.summary: Update frontend version markers so the deployed app reports Version 58.
acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, fetching the deployed app HTML shows the app-version meta content as `58` and the `/version.txt` asset returns `58`.

file_operations.description: Change the version marker contents from `57` to exactly `58` (no extra whitespace/newlines beyond the existing file format).
Update the `<meta name="app-version" ...>` tag content from `57` to `58`.

requirements.summary: Ensure the production publish process for Version 58 is executable and verifiable (operator runbook + smoke checks).
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is executed using `dfx deploy --network ic` for the app canisters.
Post-deploy smoke checks confirm: (1) Internet Identity login works, (2) the Dashboard loads, (3) navigating to a resident profile works, and (4) no new blocking console errors are introduced.
The live site reports version `58` via the version markers (`version.txt` and the `app-version` meta tag).

file_operations.description: Create a Version 58 production deployment runbook that includes the required `dfx deploy --network ic` command and a concise post-deploy smoke-check section covering: Internet Identity login, Dashboard load, resident profile navigation, and checking for blocking console errors.
Add a brief note at the top indicating this guide is superseded by `deploy-v58.md` for current production publishes (keep existing V57 steps intact for historical reference).

requirements.summary: Update deployment documentation checklist to include Version 58 version marker verification steps.
acceptanceCriteria: A Version 58 deployment guide exists (either update `frontend/docs/deploy-v57.md` to v58 wording, or add a new `frontend/docs/deploy-v58.md`) and includes: (1) checking `frontend/public/version.txt` is `58`, (2) checking `frontend/index.html` meta `app-version` is `58`, and (3) post-deploy verification steps for the live publish.
Any version numbers mentioned in the updated/new deployment doc are consistent with `58` (no lingering `57` references in version marker verification steps).

file_operations.description: Write the Version 58 deployment checklist, explicitly documenting the two version marker checks (`frontend/public/version.txt` == `58` and `frontend/index.html` meta `app-version` == `58`) plus post-deploy live verification steps (confirming the deployed HTML meta and `version.txt` asset return `58`).
